Name: Emerald Martini
Ingredients: 50 ml Absolut Lime Vodka from freezer
10 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of mint leaf, lemon and lime zest twists.
EXPRESS lemon and lime zest twists over cocktail and discard.
Garnish with mint leaf floated in the centre of the cocktail.
Review: Green-tinged rather than emerald-coloured but with herbal-lime notes that, along with the name, suggest a greenness in the flavour.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2005 at Bugsy's Bar in Prague, Czech Republic.
Nutrition: One serving of Emerald Martini contains 92 calories
